scripts.one: cd ../odoo-printer-manager && cargo build --release && mv ./target/release/odoo_printer_manager ../electronApp/scripts/main && cd ../electronApp && electron-builder
scripts.one_win: set RUSTFLAGS=-C target-feature=+crt-static && rustup target add i686-pc-windows-msvc && cd ..\odoo-printer-manager && cargo build --release --target i686-pc-windows-msvc && copy /Y .\target\i686-pc-windows-msvc\release\odoo_printer_manager.exe ..\electronApp\scripts\main.exe && cd ..\electronApp && electron-builder
